title: Dorsey, Lummis Push for Bitcoin Tax Relief as Block Expands BTC Payments
contentSnippet: Block founder Jack Dorsey has pushed for a tax exemption for Bitcoin transactions, as Sen. Lummis confirms she’s “working on it.”

title: Crypto Investors Are Now Using Wall Street's Age Old Strategy to Invest, Bitwise CEO Says
contentSnippet: Institutional investors have now shifted to more sophisticated and reliable analysis methods for selecting crypto investments as the digital asset market matures, according to Bitwise's Hunter Horsley

title: XRP’s ‘most bullish pattern’ targets $6 despite latest correction
contentSnippet: XRP price held above $2.80 on Thursday, increasing the altcoin’s chances of rallying toward the cup-and-handle pattern’s target above $6.

title: Bank of France wants EU crypto regulation under Paris-based ESMA
contentSnippet: The Bank of France’s governor called for crypto oversight to be given to the European Securities and Markets Authority, and for tightening MiCA’s rules on stablecoin issuance.

title: New Japan PM may boost crypto economy, ‘refine’ blockchain regulations
contentSnippet: Takaichi’s election may have a “material impact” on the governance and regulatory perception of crypto assets in Japan, experts told Cointelegraph.

title: Two Prime Hits Record $827 Million in Q3 Bitcoin-Backed Loans

title: DeFi TVL hits record $237B as daily active wallets fall 22% in Q3: DappRadar
contentSnippet: DeFi TVL reached a record $237 billion in the third quarter of 2025, but DApp wallet activity fell 22% as SocialFi and AI DApps lost momentum.

title: Swiss crypto bank Amina to offer Polygon’s POL staking with up to 15% rewards
contentSnippet: Amina Bank has become the first regulated financial institution to offer staking for Polygon’s POL token, allowing institutional clients to earn up to 15% rewards.

title: Ripple Expands Into Bahrain in Boost for RLUSD
contentSnippet: Ripple's RLUSD stablecoin is central to its strategy of connecting tokenized assets with traditional payment systems.

title: MiniPay Woos Freelancers with Stablecoin-Backed Virtual Dollar, Euro Accounts
contentSnippet: The wallet provider says it wants to simplify international transfers, with dollars and euros instantly converted into stablecoins.

title: Crypto ETPs smash 2024 total with $48.7B pouring in this year: CoinShares
contentSnippet: Inflows to crypto funds have topped last year’s total, with Bitcoin dominance slipping at $30 billion while Ether and altcoins surge.

title: Citi Joins Visa in Backing Stablecoin Payments Company BVNK
contentSnippet: The growth of the stablecoin sector as been one of the standout trends in the digital asset industry over the last year.

title: QumulusAI Secures $500M Blockchain-Backed Facility to Scale AI Compute Infrastructure
contentSnippet: The non-recourse facility allows QumulusAI to borrow stablecoins against up to 70% of its approved GPU deployments.

title: Two Indicted in Tel Aviv Over $600,000 ‘Wrench Attack’ on Bitcoin Trader
contentSnippet: The alleged home invasion adds to a record year of physical attacks on crypto holders, with 52 cases globally in 2025.

title: Luxembourg sovereign wealth fund dips into Bitcoin ETFs with 1% stake
contentSnippet: Luxembourg’s sovereign wealth fund has allocated 1% of its $900 million portfolio, or about $9 million, into Bitcoin ETFs.

title: Bitcoin Slips Below Key Support as Dollar Strengthens Ahead of Powell Speech
contentSnippet: The crypto market retreats after a week of strong ETF inflows, with traders eyeing Powell’s remarks for clues on Fed policy amid data gaps from the government shutdown.

title: NEAR Intents Activity Spikes as Zcash’s Zashi Wallet Taps It for Private Swaps
contentSnippet: Zashi Swaps let users convert BTC, SOL, USDC and other supported assets directly into ZEC inside the app, where they can then be shielded.

title: Luxembourg Claims Bragging Rights as First Eurozone Nation to Invest in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Luxembourg’s Intergenerational Sovereign Wealth Fund (FSIL) has invested 1% of its holdings in Bitcoin ETFs, making it the first state level fund in the Eurozone to do so.

title: What really drives altcoin seasons? A closer look
contentSnippet: Key factors, such as Bitcoin dominance, liquidity shifts, market cycles and investor sentiment, drive altcoin season.

title: UK Lifts Retail Ban on Crypto ETNs, Paving Way for Investments From Pensions, ISAs
contentSnippet: The U.K. has ended its ban on crypto exchange-traded notes, letting retail investors hold bitcoin and ether ETNs tax-free in pension and ISA accounts.

title: SoftBank’s PayPay acquires 40% stake in Binance Japan
contentSnippet: SoftBank’s mobile payment service PayPay acquired a 40% stake in the Japanese subsidiary of Binance after applying for US listing in August.

title: Why Bitcoin's Rally Has Room to Run This Month
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s record rally appears durable, as on-chain data and derivatives point to restrained selling and steady institutional confidence.

title: Zcash Extends October Rally: What's Driving the Surge?

title: Bitwise and 21Shares Add Staking, Slash Fees in Latest Solana and Ethereum ETF Filings

title: The Decentralized Map Paying for Data That Google Uses for Free
